channel.title: UDP Media Server
channel.description: Play an NCL application made available in an MPEG-2 Transport Stream from a UDP Media Server. This feature is in Beta stage, which means that unexpected results may arise.

item.title: Source Address
item.description: Source IP address, which can be a unicast or a multicast address. Use the following format: 999.999.999.999

item.title: Source Port
item.description: Source UDP port. Use the following format: 9999

item.title: > Start
item.description: Press [Enter] to start listening to the specified UDP stream.
